Texts.Chs: ^orange;裂变反应炉^reset;的功能是极其强大的。它可以熔炼那些^orange;其他熔炉所不能处理^reset;的金属。用^orange;煤^reset;萃取一些^orange;碳 (C)^reset;，并尝试制作一块碳板吧！
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Fission Furnace^reset; is extremely useful, and can melt down metals ^green;no other furnace^reset; can handle. Extract some ^orange;coal^reset; for ^orange;carbon^reset; and try making a carbon plate!

Texts.Chs: 如果没有裂变反应炉对那些高强度的金属进行加工，你的研究进度将止步不前。时刻让其待命。它绝对不会令你失望！
Texts.Eng: You won't get far without one of these doing its work on the higher-strength metals you are bound to find. Always have it ready to go. It will never let you down!
